title: User Signup with Valid Credentials
description: Verify that a new user can successfully sign up using valid email, username, and password and receive a valid JWT token session.

steps.description: Navigate to the signup page
Input valid username, email, and password
Submit the signup form
Verify user account is created in the database
Verify a JWT token is issued and stored for the session
Verify redirection to dashboard or landing page

title: User Login with Correct Credentials
description: Verify user can login with valid credentials and receive a JWT token for session management.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input valid registered username/email and password
Click the login button
Verify user is authenticated and a JWT token is generated
Verify access is granted to protected routes like dashboard

title: User Login with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify login attempt fails when invalid username or password is provided.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input invalid username/email or incorrect password
Click the login button
Verify login fails and an error message is shown
Verify no JWT token is generated or stored in session

title: JWT Token Expiry and Session Management
description: Verify JWT tokens expire after the configured period and users are logged out accordingly.

steps.description: Login successfully and obtain JWT token
Simulate or wait for JWT token expiry time
Attempt to access protected routes
Verify access is denied and user is prompted to login again

title: Project Creation and Persistence
description: Verify users can create a new project and that it is persisted in the database.

steps.description: Login and navigate to dashboard
Click 'Create Project' and enter a unique project name
Submit project creation
Verify project is listed in dashboard project list
Verify project data is stored persistently in the database

title: Project Rename and Persistence
description: Verify user can rename an existing project and the new name is saved persistently.

steps.description: Navigate to dashboard and select a project
Rename the project with a new unique name
Save the changes
Verify the updated project name is shown in dashboard
Verify new name is persisted in the database

title: Project Deletion
description: Verify user can delete a project and it is removed from the dashboard and database.

steps.description: Navigate to dashboard and select a project
Initiate project deletion and confirm
Verify project is no longer listed in dashboard
Verify project and files are removed from the database

title: Create, Rename, and Delete Files in File Explorer
description: Verify users can create new files/folders, rename them, and delete them within a project using the file explorer with persistence.

steps.description: Open a project and access the file explorer
Create new file and verify appearance in file tree
Verify the new file is saved in the database
Rename the file and confirm
Verify the file name is updated in file tree and database
Delete the file
Verify the file is removed from file tree and database

title: Monaco Editor Syntax Highlighting and Autosave
description: Verify the Monaco Editor displays Python syntax highlighting correctly and auto-saves changes after modifications.

steps.description: Open Python file in Monaco Editor
Type valid and invalid Python syntax
Verify syntax highlighting updates correctly for Python code constructs
Make changes and pause typing to trigger auto-save
Verify changes are saved and persisted to database without error

title: Execute Python Code in Sandbox with Output Capture
description: Verify Python code is executed in a secure sandbox, returning standard output, error output, and execution time accurately.

steps.description: Write Python code in editor
Click 'Run' to execute code
Verify stdout displays expected output correctly
Verify stderr shows any execution errors if present
Verify displayed execution time is reasonable and under 10 seconds

title: Python Code Execution Timeout Handling
description: Verify sandbox enforces execution timeout and terminates code running longer than the allowable time with proper error messaging.

steps.description: Write an infinite loop or long-running Python code
Run the code in the editor
Verify code execution terminates after timeout
Verify user is shown a timeout error message

title: AI Chat Assistant Code Explanation
description: Verify AI chat panel can explain selected code correctly upon user request.

steps.description: Select snippet of Python code in editor
Open AI Chat panel and send 'explain' request
Verify AI returns a clear explanation relevant to the code snippet

title: AI Chat Assistant Code Fix Suggestion
description: Verify AI chat panel detects errors and suggests code fixes when prompted.

steps.description: Write code that contains an error
Request AI chat panel to 'fix' the code
Verify AI suggests corrected code or instructions to resolve issues

title: AI Chat Assistant Code Optimization Suggestion
description: Verify AI chat panel analyzes existing code and suggests performance or style optimizations.

steps.description: Write functional but suboptimal Python code in editor
Request AI to optimize the code via chat
Verify AI returns helpful suggestions or improved code

title: Data Upload of CSV and Excel Files
description: Verify users can upload CSV and Excel files, which are validated, accepted, and integrated into the project file tree.

steps.description: Open a project and open the file upload drag-and-drop area
Drag and drop or select a valid CSV file
Verify file type validation accepts the CSV
Verify file is added to the project file tree
Repeat process with a valid Excel file (.xlsx)
Verify Excel file is accepted and listed in the file tree

title: AI Generates Cleaning and Visualization Code from Natural Language Prompts
description: Verify AI generates valid Python data cleaning and visualization code from user prompts after file upload.

steps.description: Upload a CSV or Excel file containing sample data
Input a natural language prompt requesting data cleaning or visualization code
Send prompt to AI through chat interface
Verify AI returns syntactically correct Python code targeting the uploaded data
Run the generated code in sandbox
Verify code executes successfully and output matches intended cleaning or plot

title: File Upload Validation for Unsupported Types
description: Verify the system rejects unsupported file types during upload with appropriate error messages.

steps.description: Attempt to upload unsupported file types like .exe, .bin, or very large files over limit
Verify upload is rejected and an informative error message is displayed
Verify no unauthorized files are added to the file tree or database

title: Integrated Terminal Package Installation and Shell Commands
description: Verify integrated terminal accepts shell commands, executes correctly, and reflects changes like package installations.

steps.description: Open integrated terminal within an active project
Run shell commands like 'pip install package_name' inside terminal
Verify terminal displays command output and success messages
Run Python code that uses installed packages through editor
Verify packages are available and code executes without import errors

title: Password Security - Bcrypt Hashing Verification
description: Verify that user passwords are hashed using bcrypt and not stored in plain text.

steps.description: Sign up a user with a known password
Verify password is stored hashed with bcrypt in the database
Verify no plain text password is stored or transmitted

title: SQL Injection Prevention in Authentication APIs
description: Verify authentication endpoints defend against SQL injection attempts during login and signup.

steps.description: Attempt login with SQL injection strings in username or password fields
Verify authentication fails safely without exposing errors or bypassing security
Attempt signup with SQL injection payloads
Verify signup is rejected or sanitized input handled correctly

title: Performance: Landing Page Load Time
description: Verify landing page loads completely within 3 seconds under normal network conditions.

steps.description: Navigate to the landing page
Verify the page content is fully rendered within 3 seconds

title: Performance: Code Execution Time
description: Verify that normal code execution completes within 10 seconds in the sandbox environment.

steps.description: Execute typical Python scripts including some using numpy and pandas
Verify execution completes in under 10 seconds

title: UI Responsiveness Across Device Types
description: Verify that the user interface is responsive, works correctly and maintains layout integrity on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.

steps.description: Open the application on desktop, tablet, and mobile viewport sizes
Verify navigation, editor, file explorer, console, and chat panel display correctly without layout breaks
Verify UI elements remain accessible and functional

title: Auto-Save Reliability During Editing
description: Verify that changes made in code editor and file operations are auto-saved reliably without data loss.

steps.description: Open a file and edit code continuously
Pause typing to trigger auto-save multiple times
Verify no loss of code changes after navigation or page reload
Perform file rename and deletion operations
Verify file tree and database stay consistent without orphaned or missing files

title: Secure Code Execution Sandbox Isolation
description: Verify that code execution environment is sandboxed to prevent access to host OS resources, network, or unauthorized files.

steps.description: Attempt to execute code that accesses OS files outside sandbox or tries network calls
Verify such attempts are blocked, with appropriate error messages, and no system compromise
